page.title: 01Elstead Village & common
page.content: Elstead village is basically a commuter area as there is a very limited amount of local employment, as transport is almost more existent in the public sector. The total population is approx. 2,600. The nearest main shopping area is 6 miles away where the majority of the people who have private transport go to shop. The local shops although convenient have most of their goods at higher prices. The surrounding commons although open to the public and have a high value of natural interest, are used by the army for training, especially by the Airbourne Divisions. Parts of the common are classed as bog land and are considered one of the most interesting for flora & fauna in the country.
